description: With just four ingredients, this tasty beef salad will feed the family in a flash.
name: 15Minute Middle Eastern Beef Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 25g McCormick baharat style street food seasoning

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat and add the olive oil.
Add mince and cook, stirring occasionally to break up mince, for 31/2 minutes or until beginning to brown.
Add the seasoning and cook for a further 11/2 minutes. Add the chickpeas and stir through for 1 minute or until thoroughly combined and heated through.
In a bowl, toss salad together with the dressing, pumpkin seeds and feta from the kit, and divide among bowls. Top with beef and chickpeas to serve.
